title: Request help on champ design
body:
So ive got plans to deign a champ. i know exaclty what i want them to do and an idea of what i want them to look like.

thing is i cant draw and need someone to help me bring the champ to life.

if anyone is interested please respond
{{champion:103}}

replies.body: start with google image searchs and plagurise anything you see, go from there, i suggest printing and getting butchers paper and tracing it, then u can augment the image and rinse/repeat. overlays until u got something u want, then scan it back in, then find a online artist/gfx design modeller (y)

Maybe first make a comment here on what you think the champion will be like in game, skill set wise, or did you purely plan on making a champion on the looks and not what it will do in game?

You need to give the artist community something to think about before offering their services to assist you.
